examples: Python scripts (.py) go into the 'py/' directory.
Markdown files (.md) go into the 'md/' directory.
SVG files (.svg) go into the 'svg/' directory.
Shell scripts (.sh) go into the 'sh/' directory.
path_to_scripting: This JSON file provides concrete examples for applying the file architecture principles. It is not directly scriptable, but serves as documentation that an LLM or a linter script could use. An LLM could reference these examples when generating file organization suggestions, or a linter could use them to check for adherence to the prescribed file placement. This helps to ensure consistency in file organization across the project.
